com.github.mathiewz

Class Sound

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mathiewz.Sound

  • public class Sound
extends Object
    A single sound effect loaded from either OGG or XM/MOD file. Sounds are allocated to channels dynamically - if not channel is available the sound will not play.
    Author:
    kevin
